description: Noncrossing connected graphs on n nodes on a circle and having no triangular faces.
formula: Sum(binomial(n-2+i, i)*binomial(3*n-3-i, n-2-2*i), i=0..floor((n-2)/2))/(n-1)Contribution from _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 09 2010: (Start)G.f. A(x): Let F(x) = 1 + A(x)/x = 1 + x + 3*x^2 + 13*x^3 + 66*x^4 +...then F(x) satisfies: x*F(x)^4 = (1 - F(x))*(1 - 3*F(x) + F(x)^2). (End)
author: _Emeric Deutsch_
